channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [GROOVY-2170] Purge commands don't work anymore in the new shell
item.description:
Trying to purge the buffer or anything yields this stacktrace.

Custom variables purged
No classes have been loaded
No custom imports have been defined

item.summary: Purge commands don't work anymore in the new shell

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
